definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-38" y="-2"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">EntityLightningBolt</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">entity.elder_guardian.curse</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.75</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_iscreative"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
